kw.name: Get File
kw.msg: ${dsr_content} = List of tasks performed: - Followed the Robot Framework Tutorial by Automation Step by Step: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLhW3qG5bs-L9l2I8K8dEhw6HXy-Z-33w3 - Worked towards better understand...
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg:
Typing text 'List of tasks performed: - Followed the Robot Framework Tutorial by Automation Step by Step: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLhW3qG5bs-L9l2I8K8dEhw6HXy-Z-33w3 - Worked towards better understanding Robot Framework's usage using the official User Guide: https://robotframework.org/robotframework/latest/RobotFrameworkUserGuide.html
Have been able to successfully install Robot Framework and SeleniumLibrary using PIP. Have also gained an understanding of how the following sections are to be handled in a Robot file: Settings Variables Test Cases Tasks Keywords
In order to put the newly gained basic understanding of this Framework, worked towards writing Robot file from scratch for creating today's PEMS ticket. ' into text field 'id=issue_description'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
